mapper.select: select count(*) from article where is_published = 1
select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m') as create_time from article where is_published = 1 group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m') order by create_time desc
select id , title , date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as create_time from article where date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m') = #{date} and is_published = 1 order by create_time desc
select id , title, thumbnail from article where is_published = true order by rand() limit ${count}
select * from article where is_published = true and category_id = #{categoryId}
select * from article where is_published = true and id in (select article_id from article_tag_ref where tag_id = #{tagId})
